name: Fortumo OÜ
goal: Founded in 2007, Fortumo is a leading global provider of direct carrier billing. Fortumo payments cover 100 markets and connect merchants to subscribers of more than 350 mobile operator networks.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Digital economy and society
euInitiatives: Payment services (PSD 2) directive affecting online payments, carrier billing and transaction limits. GDPR.
